alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Onondaga; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 2:26PM EST until February 23 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM WEDNESDAY TO 4 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Snow and ice accumulations are most likely across elevations above 1400 feet. * WHERE...Yates, Seneca, Southern Cayuga, Onondaga, Madison, Cortland and Chenango counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM Wednesday to 4 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and possibly the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation starts off as a period of snow, heavy at times Wednesday afternoon. The snow is then forecast to change over to sleet and freezing rain after 5 PM Wednesday evening. Periods of light freezing rain and sleet will change over to rain late Wednesday night, and then possibly mix with sleet and freezing rain late Thursday morning before going back to rain in the afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Onondaga; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Yates
